website_summaries.verdict: A-Audio's on-ear Lyric headphones look good and are built rock-solid, but purists should be aware of a slightly bass-heavy sound signature.
cons: Sound signature leans more towards the low end than ideal
Earcups can get hot after prolonged use

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality that feels solid. Comes with a couple of cables, carrying case and velcro bag for the cables and adapter. Batteries are included and the noise cancelling works surprisingly well. I think the "bass" sound mode has the best overall sound, but some genres do sound better in just audio mode. The headphones do fit me as around-ear, but I am sure that some others will find these more as an on-ear headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: If you dont mind having a cable on your headphones you will not find a better set for this price! These are damn near bose quality no joke. I do feel they could be a bit louder but that may just be my cell phone and I think it will be loud enough for most. It does satisfy me just thought they would go crazy loud lol. These used to sell for $299.00 so cant beat the value. Give them a shot Im sure you will be pleased. There are a couple videos on youtube about these too.
customer_reviews.author: Lance M.

customer_reviews.title: These are a steal!!
customer_reviews.text: For under $20 you can't go wrong with these! I remember when these were over $250. They come with a beautiful presentation and a very nice lookin carrying case. Sure, they're not wireless and they take AAA batteries, but for less than $20 who can complain about that? They're built well and a little on the heavy side as compared to a typical plastic headphone. Sounds is very good, especially with the bass boost feature on. I would highly recommend these at this price point! You really can't go wrong..
customer_reviews.author: Notorious JMB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Use it at work's factory floor. first requirement is comfort as will need to wear hours at a time. Second is noise cancellation and low price. Meet all my requirements and sound quality was a huge bonus. Product is so good I bought a second one for personal use such as workout and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Really like these headphones there is a lot of metal so ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like these headphones there is a lot of metal so you can tell they are made to last unlike the cheap plastic stuff for twice the price. Sound is good lacking in the bass dept but the anc does work well when I fly only issues I have and it might be from not wearing over the ear headphones very often. They hurt at least one of my ears after 2 or 3 hours of use .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great option with quality sound and construction
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound with optional noise cancelling and bass boost. Construction is heavy but very comfortable as well. The cord could be better but its modular and can be replaced as needed. The heavy duty hinges make it both flexible, and durable. I got a second pair just in case ☺
customer_reviews.author: GullyFoyle

customer_reviews.title: So-so headphones
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it would be best if you bought the Xiaomi Professional Store Hybrid Dual Mi Hybrid Earphone In-Ear Headphones Multi-Unit Circle Iron Mixed Piston Earphones. They sound amazing. These A-Audio headphones are so-so in terms of of noise cancellation. And hope you do no have a big head, they will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rodriguez Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and look for price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a special New Year’s eve Dj show that was very disco and chrome themed. I didn’t think I would actually use them for audio but they sound great and I decorated them for the show now I have a great looking and great sounding extra set of headphones. Check out the video!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these headphones and I'm so glad I was able to find them again (this is my second purchase overall of the headphones) at a lower price! Too notch. Thanks a lot. Will do more business with the merchant. They were efficient and timely.
customer_reviews.author: Sabryia

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They're ok, not bad or great. They don't fit over ear well and noise cancelling is no where near bose quality. Then again for the cheaper price they're good.
customer_reviews.author: Grifatkins

customer_reviews.title: I loved the style
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style, unfortunately I had problems with the max bass. My set was defective because a coworker purchase the exact headphones with no issues. The performance is great and they use them daily. My honest opinion is I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kamala Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my head. The quality seemed nice at first but it felt like the side that housed the batter wanted to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Cesaro

customer_reviews.title: They are a little heavy but they sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I do not see how you can go wrong for the money. They are a little heavy but they sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation is minimal but the sound quality is very reasonable for the price. Been using them for months in the office, hours at a time - comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aviv Stern

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are good. Very high quality audio
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are good. Very high quality audio. The cord that came with it is too small though. Other then that, it's a steal for $20. I recommend it for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Beiting

customer_reviews.title: Need some breaking in, they can be uncomfortable for the first week or so, but too fantastic of a sound to pass up.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best pair of headphones I have ever owned. For $50, hard to say no. Extensive use can wear out the leather/foam binding, but that's after about 2 years of use for me. Comes with a warranty card that you can use to register on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3-way Switch Malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: The 3-way switch malfunctions. It needs to be returned. Otherwise, it is comfortable to wear, mellow, and well worth this exceptional price.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous item, fabulous price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal! Love them, superior sound for a very reasonable price. The case, the extra cords, the cleaning cloth, the quality product, couldn't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dubba U

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, noise canceling works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on sale. Great buy, noise canceling works like a champ. Only downside is how big the case and headphones are. When space is at a premium I fly with my sound isolating earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel good and sound great. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing with what I got for the price. Perfectly fit and ear cup too is great.
customer_reviews.author: Olayemi O.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the price!! A little gaudy but they work great for traveling at a fraction of the price of other brands
customer_reviews.author: M. Pasquarette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's an older model but sounds good and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: JawjaBill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as good as some of the much more expensive head phones
customer_reviews.author: nandita

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price, but they're On-ear not Over-ear
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying these are great for the price I bought them at; $38.00. I needed a comfortable pair for work, and these do the job perfectly. They sound good, Noise canceling and Bass are decent, a really great deal at $38.00. The only gripe I could have, is that they said they were "Over-ear". Unless you have tiny baby ears they are On-ear headphones. Because of the advertising being a bit off, these get stuck with a 4 star rating. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spears

customer_reviews.title: Without using ANC or Bass Boost they sound like regular headphones
customer_reviews.text: Without using ANC or Bass Boost they sound like regular headphones. Once you switch on the ANC you notice a difference, but when you switch the Bass Boost there is an extreme difference in sound and the bass hits hard. They get moderately loud and they have decent highs and mids. It is a pleasurable listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Z Smith

customer_reviews.title: The ANC setting sounds like the music is being played through a soup can
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones about 2 weeks or so ago. The only sound level available that I find usable is the bass booster. The ANC setting sounds like the music is being played through a soup can. The 3rd setting is with no adjustment to the sound. This setting is very weak and pretty well useless. With that being said, these are no where near worth the original $300 price tag. Good thing they weren't priced at that! :-) But, at $80, I would buy them again. They are extremely comfortable to wear, looks are above cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: ZonovX

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: "Over-Ear" makes you think you could actually put these over your ears. I don't have the smallest ears but I can't even get half my ears in these. There is no possible way for these to be comfortable for a full plane ride if you were getting them for that. The active noise canceling does remove outside noise but has a ton of white noise (static) when on.The bass boost is also effective but the sound quality is lacking due to the static that is audible. I purchased these for $86.
customer_reviews.author: Incredible

customer_reviews.title: ... feeling when owners of 300-350$ beats look at you like "What's this
customer_reviews.text: That feeling when owners of 300-350$ beats look at you like "What's this? It's so hot!". Sound is great. Look is just gorgeous. The only disadvantage that I found is that they are literally too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Prokopiv

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: There was a mix-up and the owner resolved the issue...
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Knight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones they are everything that I expected and more.
customer_reviews.author: James Dixon

customer_reviews.title: On-ear?
customer_reviews.text: These seem to me like on-ear headphones as opposed to over-ear. They sit on my ears, not over them like my Sennheiser HD518 headphones. Other than that, the sound is solid. They're my first pair of ANC headphones and that seems to work well although I don't have anything to compare it to. For the price (&109) I'm pretty pleased with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice
customer_reviews.text: The headphones broke in half and no sound coming through the headphones. I want them replaced or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice build. Nice case, it's easy for headphones to get broken lying around or while traveling, so a good fitting case is very useful. Kudos for having removable patch cables. Very comfortable for on-ear phones, most on-ear phones bother my ginormous ears but not these. But for better sound quality just get something in the Sony MDR line or Audio Technica if noise cancellation is needed. My Vmodas also sound better than these. They really are nicely made if a bit gawdy with the chrome (but I admit I kind of like it), I just wish the sound was equal to the materials and manufacturing. All flash and no substance.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simerly

customer_reviews.title: value vs cost are not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling is almost non existent. Sometimes something within battery compartment makes slightly noticeable ticking notice when moving head, and when you catch it is annoying. On the other hand build quality is nice, Base Enhancer really improves listening experience, and case is nice ... but considering price
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

customer_reviews.title: These were easy to set up and get going
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to set up and get going. They are a sleek matte black finish with soft foam padding all around. I love how they fit and cup my ears, with no pinching or pressure on my head, and a gentle flexibility for a near perfect fit (I get a lot of headaches so a comfort fit is VERY important to me). The sound is great and bass enhancement was awesome for certain types of music that I listen to. These also block out annoying noises going on in the house which is very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality all around from the packaging to the product. Love the case, love the comfortable fit. The design is well thought out even down to the battery cover. The sound is very good, and the cups do a good job of keeping outside noise out. Can't find anything to quibble about except the price, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: barbre

customer_reviews.title: Very good noise isolation even without turning on the music
customer_reviews.text: Very good noise isolation even without turning on the music. Met my expectations on that. Good for flights. But when I used it for making phone calls the person at the other end could not hear me clearly!
customer_reviews.author: sudha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled with the quality and value of these headphones and the extras it came with. Great purchase. Extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Learn

customer_reviews.title: I got these as a gift and I was disappointed. The audio sounded distorted and then the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift and I was disappointed. The audio sounded distorted and then the right side just cut off completely. I was expecting better quality for something that is very well presented.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Uzategui

customer_reviews.title: Watch out Bose and Beats
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. After feeling disappointed with my pair of Beats headphones, I switched to a pair of Bose. I was pleased with the sound quality and comfort until my relative put a pair of these A-Audio headphones in my hand to try out. There was an immediate distinction in comfort quality and once I pressed play, blew me away! They fit like a glove and the sound was brilliant and was by far superior. I ended up selling my Bose, purchased these, and could not be happier with my decision. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: I love my new A-Audio Matte black
customer_reviews.text: I love my new A-Audio Matte black! The feel, sound quality and overall: Luxury headphones... They look great, sound great.. Very happy, would recommend.... A+
customer_reviews.author: Jose V

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are amazing! They're design is impeccable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing! I recently purchased the Legacy Headphones with 3-Stage Technology. They're design is impeccable. A part from their flawless design, they have active noise cancellation, which make them ideal for travel and other activities. I have purchased Beats and Bose in the past, but I feel like this is another market. This market represents luxury and lifestyle. A-Audio is the balance between the design that was not in the market and impeccable sound we all desire. I highly recommend them! They are absolutely mind-blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Aristeguieta

customer_reviews.title: A-Audio sounds better, feels better and looks better than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many different headphones before these ones. A-Audio sounds better, feels better and looks better than any other one i've had before. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Top Product
customer_reviews.text: I just got these and they ROCK! Amazing design and unbelievable sound. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Maria N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT HEADPHONES!!!! Amazing quality of the sound. They look fantastic. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MollyN

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: The quality sound and look was fantastic! The stitched leather was soft and high quality...a definite recommend for colleagues and friends
customer_reviews.author: dk NY

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very well made. The superb sound quality and comfortable fit makes these worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A3L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My matte black headphones are amazing!!! They sound incredible and they look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: francesco sutera

customer_reviews.title: Better than beats!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these. I see these as the Audemars Piguet of headphones. Amazing bass =)
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other headphones in the industry, these really make a difference in terms of style, quality of sound and practicality. Simply great!
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro sutera

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I am a big headphone guy, I have been collecting headphones for 10 years now. I ve never experienced such emotions and exitment while listening to misic untill I tried those. The quality of the sound is unbittable and is combine with compfortness for you hears and, If you ld like, strong power. So happy I got them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Riccardo Ferragamo

product_meta.title: A-Audio A12 Lyric On-Ear Headphone, Matte Phantom Black
product_meta.description: Color:Matte Phantom Black/Lyric| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingThe Lyric pairs a compact on-ear design with passive noise cancellation for rich, crystal clear sound reproduction. With premium sound quality and metal construction, the Lyric On-Ear Headphones draw inspiration from classic auto and luxury timepiece design with a supple diamond-quilted leather band and octagonal bezels secured by hexagonal screws on each ear cup. This signature A-Audio aesthetic brings together high-tech components and materials engineered for optimal sound and enduring performance including custom 40mm drivers, powerful circuitry, chrome and gold plating, and stainless steel.
feature_bullets: Memory foam padding for long-lasting comfort
Fully articulating and collapsible ear cups for easy storage and travel
Comes with a detachable phone cord with remote and mic, and an audio only cable
Dual jacks for sharing music with friends featuring 24K gold plated contacts for optimum signal transfer
Fully articulating and collapsible ear cups for easy storage and travel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
